settings.title: Cookie Settings

essential.title: Essential Cookies

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your data while crafting your engraved gifts
privacy.intro: Your trust matters. We collect only what we need to personalize and fulfill your engraved orders, and we keep it secure.

data.heading: Data we collect
data.copy: We collect contact details, shipping information, and order history to fulfill and support your engraving purchases.

items.account: Account details (name, email, phone) to manage your profile and support requests.
items.orders: Order and shipping details for engraving, personalization, and delivery.
items.analytics: Anonymous analytics to improve our catalog and site experience.

cookies.heading: Cookies
cookies.copy: We use essential cookies for security and checkout, plus optional analytics/marketing. You can manage them in the cookie banner.

security.heading: Security
security.copy: We use encrypted connections, role-based access, and limited retention to safeguard your information.

contact.heading: Questions
contact.copy: If you have privacy questions or data requests, contact our team.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: Our approach to cookies for a smooth engraving experience
cookiePolicy.intro: We use cookies to keep your cart, remember preferences, and improve our engraving storefront.

what.heading: What are cookies?
what.copy: Small text files stored on your device that help the site function, stay secure, and remember your preferences.

types.heading: Types of cookies we use
types.essential: Essential: security, authentication, cart, and checkout.
types.analytics: Analytics: anonymous usage to improve products and navigation.
types.marketing: Marketing: personalize offers and measure campaigns.
types.preferences: Preferences: remember language, region, and display settings.

control.heading: How to control cookies
control.copy: Use the banner controls on our site, your browser settings, or clear cookies. Essential cookies are required for checkout.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.copy: For cookie questions, reach out to our privacy team.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: The rules for shopping engraved gifts with us
terms.intro: By using this site or placing an order, you agree to these terms. They ensure we can craft, personalize, and deliver your engraved items reliably.

use.heading: Use of the site
use.copy: You agree to provide accurate information, respect intellectual property, and not misuse the site. Accounts are for your personal use; keep your login secure.

orders.heading: Orders, engraving, and payment
orders.copy: Personalized orders begin production after payment. Proofs are produced only when stated. Prices and availability may change. Taxes and shipping are shown at checkout. You authorize us to engrave text or artwork you provide.

returns.heading: Returns and cancellations
returns.copy: Engraved or personalized items are final sale except for defects or errors on our part. Report issues within 7 days of delivery with photos so we can remake or refund when appropriate.

contact.heading: Need help?
contact.copy: For questions about these terms or your order, contact our support team.
